title: FridaBaby 3-in-1 Humidifier with Essential Oil Diffuser and Nightlight
description: Shop 3-in-1 Humidifier with Essential Oil Diffuser and Nightlight and read reviews at Walgreens. Pickup & Same Day Delivery available on most store items.
cleaned_text: and Nightlight1.0ea How would you like to receive this item ? Description - COOL MIST HUMIDIFIER: Uses the power of ultrasonic vibration to turn water into a cool hydrating mist that runs for up to 12 hours. Mist adjuster goes from gentle mist to tropical rainforest with a twist of the knob. - DIFFUSER: Add Breath Frida Vapor Drops or any aromatherapy-grade essential oil for easier breathing - it covers up to 320 square feet with a 0.5 gallon tank. - COLOR CHANGING NIGHTLIGHT: Equipped with a range of nightlight colors for even more control over the dreamy ambiance. - AUTO-STOP FEATURE: Designed to automatically turn off when the water runs out or the tank is removed. - 3-IN-1: Use humidifier, diffuser and nightlight all together, or individually. When baby's more congested than rush hour traffic, it's time to turn on the BreatheFrida 3-in-1 Humidifier for some much-needed sinus-soothing, ultrasonic humidity. Between the cool mist, the aromatherapy vapors and the relaxing color-change nightlight, baby will be in the fast lane to feeling better in no time. Perfect for baby nursery and toddler bedroom. Mist. Breathe. Sleep. Repeat. Made in China Care Instructions: Lift water tank off base, Unscrew water tank cap in a counter-clockwise direction, Fill tank with water. Use filtered or distilled water for best performance. (Optional) Add BreatheFrida Vapor Drops (or other aromatherapy-grade essential oils) as desired .Screw cap back on the water tank in a clockwise direction. Place water tank back on base. Plug power cord into base + outlet. Twist the power + mist adjuster knob clockwise to turn the humidifier on and to control the mist level.
